product_name: Merrell Arctic Fox 6 Waterproof Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Experience the beauty of winter in the waterproof, insulated Merrell Arctic Fox 6 boots. Targeted insulation and lugged soles for making tracks in the snow let you cover a lot of ground in cold temps. Waterproof nubuck leather and neoprene uppers keep your feet dry when you're stomping through slush and walking on snowy trails. 400g PrimaLoft(R) Eco(TM) partially recycled insulation over the toes and tongues and 200g at the backs of the boots keeps your feet toasty on the coldest days. Fleece lining adds warmth; lining is treated with AEGIS(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial solution to help prevent odors. Insoles have a silver film to reflect body heat back into your feet. Women-specific EVA midsoles with Air Cushion heel pockets absorb shock and supply ample cushioning for comfort. Vibram(R) Arctic Fox soles have 6mm-deep lugs for great traction. Closeout.
short_description: Experience the beauty of winter in the waterproof, insulated Merrell Arctic Fox 6 boots. Targeted insulation and lugged soles for making tracks in the snow let you cover a lot of ground in cold temps.
